programme.desc: On this episode, we explore all things seafood. From a famous fish dish in Buffalo, New York to the islands of Hawaii for an expensive fish dish then to an inland city in Texas, which is the last place you’d expect to find fine seafood.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: We try some delicious, fresh seafood in the border city of San Diego and go down to laguna beach to try some delicious Parisian fare in the heart of the O.C.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s meets an Orchardist and Food Innovation specialist. They have a shared vision to make all natural varietal – led apple juice, using the best technology in the world. He also checks out over 30 varieties of figs grown in the Mediterranean type climate of Hawkes Bay.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben takes a boat to visit a salmon farm in Akaroa and learns the difference between NZ King and Atlantic salmon. He catches salmon and cooks it on the shoreline overlooking the harbour. He checks out a high-quality homegrown culinary oil that’s both healthy and versatile, highlighting a commitment to local agriculture and sustainability.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: It’s stone fruit season! Ben visits a family run orchard in Central Otago known for its long season of stone fruit and a strong connection to the land and community. He discovers an all-electric cherry farm where premium export cherries are sold direct to Kiwis.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben experiences the Ruapehu’s region emerging food story and rich history of market gardening. He meets a sixth generation farmer who has turned a remote wilderness into a thriving eco-tourism and fine dining destination, alongside an award winning chef.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s food journey starts in the West Coast of the South Island. He meets the only NZ cranberry producer at a farm in Hokitika and travels to Blackball to learn how chorizo is made. He cooks a range of dishes at the beach incorporating these local delicacies, matched with a local beer.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Humpback whales return to Alaska's rich feeding grounds and salmon return to spawn in the rivers. The returning salmon however have to negotiate a path past hungry brown bears.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, days grow longer and temperatures rise. However, spring in Alaska is short. Animals have just two months to find food and start a family, while avoiding predators.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Destination China will take the audience to some of Yunnan's most beautiful and stunning landscapes and homes to around 6000 species of plants, 200 mammals and 500 species of birds.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Black In Space: Breaking The Color Barrier
programme.desc: The Civil Rights Movement collided with the Space Race as America battled to beat the Soviets to become the first nation to send a black astronaut into orbit.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S6 E05 - Now You See It, Now You Don't: Part 2

programme.title: CSI S5 E24 - Grave Danger (Part 1)
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood stars as San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan better known as "Dirty Harry" because of the tough way he pursues criminals in this bare-knuckled action film. Investigating the assassinations of crime bosses, Dirty Harry discovers the killers are police who, frustrated by the judicial system, have vowed to rid the city of crime by any means--even killing fellow police officers.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 270
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: World Series Cricket - Episode 1
programme.desc: Cricket in the 70s, a time when the sport was dominated by tradition and bureaucracy. Players were underpaid and playing under harsh conditions. Enter Kerry Packer, the media mogul who saw an opportunity to shake up the game.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 1
programme.desc: Adventure motorcyclist Jess Zahra embarks on an epic 5,500 kilometre ride around India. She rides with a diverse group through toward the mountains and the sacred town of Palani.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks - Cape to Cape Track
programme.desc: Julia Zemiro walks the Cape to Cape track, which goes from Margaret River to the Boranup State Forest. There, she embraces the rich biodiversity and wilderness of the coastline.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Animal Attraction: Gardens for Bees & Birds
programme.desc: Costa finds out how to choose a chook breed, Sophie plants for buzz pollinators, Jerry has tips for living with possums, Millie explores a backyard wildlife corridor, and we meet an ornithologist tracking wedge-tailed eagles.

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 2
programme.desc: Since the onset of the COVID19 pandemic the number of mental health calls received by Queensland ambulance has increased. All part of a day's work for professionals who go into each shift not knowing what lies ahead.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 36
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 31
programme.desc: Now twice a week on Monday and Friday nights, Chas and John take a closer look at the week, with Donald Trump on the global stage as world leaders are in New York for the UN General Assembly.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 37
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: World Series Cricket - Episode 1
programme.desc: Cricket in the 70s, a time when the sport was dominated by tradition and bureaucracy. Players were underpaid and playing under harsh conditions. Enter Kerry Packer, the media mogul who saw an opportunity to shake up the game.

programme.title: The Galahs
programme.desc: The Galahs

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - One-on-one with Hopoi Taione
programme.desc: Sam Wykes sits down with the legendary Hopoi Taione. Hopoi was the first Tongan and non-Japanese player to play internationally for the Japanese national rugby team in the 1980s. This is a one-on-one special episode.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Dr Anna Cody - Sex Discrimination Commissioner
programme.desc: Dr Anna Cody, Sex Discrimination Commissioner, addresses the National Press Club in partnership with Women in Media on the topic "All voices, equal futures: A vision for gender equality".

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 37
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: The Pacific - Episode 16
programme.desc: The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the stories that matter to the Pacific and the most up-to-date information, from journalists with deep regional expertise.

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The Beach
programme.desc: Danger, social codes and wild nature have all collided along the coast to create a unique Australian culture. It's the nation's verandah where champion surfers mingle with billionaires, babies, judges and crims in anonymity.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 39
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday as Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you an engaging mix of the latest news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics, global affairs, culture and weather. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 39
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 35
programme.desc: David Speers and the panel discuss the week in federal politics including climate and housing policy, tax reform, interest rates, trade, international diplomacy and the PM's trip to the United Nations General Assembly.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 34
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi presents the Offsiders AFL Grand Final Special, with all the fallout from yesterday's Premiership decider. Plus a look ahead to the NRL and NRLW Grand Finals after this weekend's Preliminary Finals.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 32
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 78
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch - Episode 30
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who appeared on News Breakfast. Plus film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 78
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 37
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: A love triangle at the University of Florida results in the murder of a popular student. An undeniable digital trail leads straight to his murderer.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Nia Wilson and her two sisters decided to take public transportation back home. But just minutes after texting their father, the sisters were brutally targeted at a train station.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: In 1998, a fire in Sandi Nieves' home that started under suspicious circumstances led to her conviction for arson, the murders of her four daughters, and the attempted murder of her son David.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: A couple is shot to death on their doorstep, and detectives have to track down the killer. In Louisville, a hearing-impaired man is stabbed in his doorway. And a woman's body is found in a trash can.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A woman alerts police to a crime she's committing; a golf game leads one player to see red on the green; a man wants to get paid by police during a traffic stop; and more!

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A murderous gang member starts a courtroom melee; a hit-and-run suspect tries to run from court; a murder suspect's mom screams at a judge; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: When a father of two is shot dead while driving, detectives must retrace his steps to figure out who killed him.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A 68-year-old father shoots his daughter's boyfriend when the couple arrives at the family home. Believing his daughter is trapped in an abusive relationship, he fires three shots.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: A deadly house fire claims the life of a family, investigators suspect foul play, and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison — though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Brush ep 13
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 9
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 1
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 3
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 12
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.
